'''Emerald''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Emerald}}, the currency used with villagers.
* {{BlockLink|Block of Emerald}}, a block crafted from emeralds.
* {{BlockLink|Emerald Ore}}, a rare ore which drops emeralds.
** {{BlockLink|Deepslate Emerald Ore}}, the deepslate variant of emerald ore.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
*{{DuItemLink|Emerald}}, the currency used with all camp merchants except the piglin merchant.
*{{MCD|Emerald Chest}}, a type of chest containing emeralds.

=== Equipment ===
*{{DuItemLink|Emerald Gear}}
**{{DuItemLink|Gilded Glory}}
**{{DuItemLink|Opulent Armor}}

=== Enchantments ===
*{{DuEnchantmentLink|Emerald Shield}}

=== Skins ===
*{{DuEntityLink|Emerald (hero)|Emerald}}, a hero unlocked by purchasing the {{MCD|Howling Peaks}} DLC.
